My projects, from most recent to least:

This website!

HTML, CSS, Figma, Jekyll

December 2024

Designed and built a personal portfolio from scratch, using Figma to craft a template and Jekyll to speed development and store repetitive elements (such as these projects) in data files that I can read from and display.

Banking System

Java, JUnit, Bash Scripting, GitHub Projects

May 2024

Took initiative by learning how to best store account and user records with hash maps, and coding a custom file database to store account records, gaining deep-level knowledge on its inner workings. Responsible for managing a project for three other developers by turning user stories into concise tasks, tracking progress to meet our biweekly performance goals, and reviewing changes to maintain functionality.

Instant Messaging App

Socket.IO, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

November 2023

Pair programmed with a partner through VS Code Live Share to implement chat rooms and the ability to send polls and photos. Learned how to represent users and chat rooms within objects, letting admins add or ban users in rooms.

FBLA Website Design

HTML, CSS, Netlify Hosting

July 2022

Created a tech repair business website, ensuring mobile compatibility with media queries and a responsive grid system. Placed 4th at the FBLA National Leadership Conference in Chicago, IL. Crafted a PowerPoint that showcased features of the website, along with use case scenarios, and presented it in district, state, and national level FBLA competitions.
